question: i am working in a sftware company and we are doing a banking project; please tell me is it haraam to continue with this job?
answer:
QUESTION
i am working in a software company. and we are doing a banking project about credit and collections. i am the incharge of user, employees, and access rights of the system. i am not engage with accounts and stuff. i am not doing any type of interest calculations. my module is to keep records of the system users and employees, applying access rights and security. so am i doing right? i am not having anyother option right now. it is very difficult to get job in any other domain. and i am planning to get married in coming May. i don't want to earn any kind of haraam money. please make dua for me.
ANSWER


Share:
According to the details of the question, your employment and responsibilities at the software company is permissible. The aspect of credits and banking project is not clear.

Is it a banking project for your company? If so, it will be permissible. If it is a project of a conventional bank, it will be Makrooh as that will be assisting in sin. The income of such a project will be Makrooh.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
